short_summary: Acquisition of one DVS Clipster 6 MK2
description: Acquisition of one DVS Clipster 6 MK2 for the National Film Board of Canada
full_summary:
# Bid Invitation for the Acquisition of a DVS Clipster 6 MK2

**Bid Title**
90030-220021: Acquisition of a DVS Clipster 6 MK2

**Bid Reference Number**
WS3800449281

**Publication Date**
December 22, 2022

**Bid Closing Date and Time**
January 13, 2023, 14:00:00 (EST)

**Bid Status**
The bid is currently open.

**Bid Description**
The National Film Board of Canada (NFB) invites bids for the acquisition of one (1) DVS Clipster 6 MK2 audio and visual equipment.

**Technical Specifications**
The equipment required includes one (1) DVS Clipster 6 MK2, a professional-quality digital audio and video editing system.

**Geographic Region**
This bid is limited to bidders who can deliver the goods to Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

**Contractual Terms**
The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

**Bidding Process**
This is a selective tendering process. All bidders must follow the instructions outlined in the tender package.

**Notice**
Bidders are invited to submit their bids electronically.

**Contact Information**
For further information, interested bidders may contact Renee-Ann Therien, Contract Officer, at renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Bid Documents**
Bid documents are available electronically.

**Evaluation Criteria**
Bids will be evaluated based on price, with the lowest bid being the successful bidder.

**Bid Cancellation**
The government reserves the right to cancel this bid, and all bidders shall be notified in writing of any bid cancellation. Eurotenderinfo acts on our behalf. Neither this website nor any of its servants, agents, employees, shall in any event be liable for any act or omission by a third party, in a decision to bid or otherwise in respect of this procurement project. Eurotenderinfo protects users' data in the agreement regarding the protection and security of personal and commercial data. Finally, the Advertiser supplies services (date-ins/bid-manager) that include creating a list of recipients of the published notifications (to users' employers), allowing Employers to create or manage user lists as these are managed by users. The Employer/bid owner decides whether or not they perform notification of bidders via or otherwise.
